title: Tom Brady and Ron DeSantis Are Said to Be on Texting Terms
description: The Republican nominee for Wisconsin governor, Tim Michels, told supporters recently that while DeSantis was watching a Packers game at Lambeau Field, he was texting the Buccaneers quarterback.
dc:creator: Reid J. Epstein
media:credit: Julio Aguilar/Getty Images and Phelan M. Ebenhack/Associated Press
media:description: Tim Michels, the Republican candidate for governor in Wisconsin, played host to Gov. Ron DeSantis of Florida at a recent Packers game. Mr. Michels said: “I say, ‘Who are you texting with?’ He says, ‘I’m texting with Tom Brady.’”
